title: Tunnels for the environment
brief_description: “Summary: features twin head greenside-mcalpine rock tunnellers at work. the film highlights two major projects: the severn wye cable tunnel to carry national super-grid electricity cables, and at st maximin in france, tunnels for the french water supply network”
